id3VybDovL2RvY3MudjEvZG9jOmQ3ODIwYzAzOWZ.value: We are a global innovation leader in the chip industry. We provide chipmakers with hardware, software and services to mass produce patterns on silicon with the highest possible level of fidelity, we call this holistic lithography. What we do increases the value and lowers the cost of a chip, which advances us all toward a smarter, more connected world. Headquartered in Europe’s top tech hub, the Brainport Eindhoven region in the Netherlands, we are a global team of over 32,000 FTEs with 122 different nationalities across 3 continents. ASML’s principal operations are in Europe, North America and Asia.
